title: LGD looks so weak right now
body: LGD is definitely one of the favourites to win worlds this year but they went into group stage and SPOILER ALERT !!! lose 3 games. I don't get wtf is happening right now and they look completely weak. LGD doesn't look like the good team they were in the LPL Playoffs and IMP doesn't look as good compared to when he is playing in playoffs. Other than that the toplane Acorn TP plays are pretty bad and GodV doesn't feel like the GodV which looked dominant when they are playing back in china. I am just so disappointed with this team.

replies.body: everyone seems to be forgetting that they finished 5th in the regular season, winning just 24/44 games.....so glad they're getting put in their place, damn overhyped bs. riot putting pyl and godv in their best players of the tournament....what a fucking joke. imp playing well without mata? all 10 players of the samsung organisation went to a few different chinese teams, one, or in this case 2, of the chinese slots at next years worlds were highly likely to be filled with former samsung players, with the remaining team being filled with arguably the 2 best players of the KT rolster teams
I don't understand why Samsung etc broke up and lost all their players? Like once you win worlds; wouldn't that mean you have created an almost flawless team for that year and should keep it?

its all about da moniez. an entire year of league of legends can become verydifferent, in fact it always has been. pro players playing differently with each patch is a common thing, referring to the juggernaut changes, mord as adc, the small yet influential changes from patch to patch. oh and all this is to say that, its not absolutely guaranteed they'll definitely be the best team next year. they've all been offered more money in china, and if i was on that team, and at least 1 other member was leaving, and i was offered more money, i would probably take it. its also another exciting challenge at least, they've been the best in the world, now they can see if they can do it again with another team....and with more money
